resources.shouldUseViewModelCachingHelpText: Check to use the client side view model caching. This applies to product listings through category navigation only and not to search results.
resources.shouldUseScrollableCollectionHelpText: Check to use the scrollable listing
resources.productsPerPageRequiredHelpText: Enter the number of products to display on a page.
resources.viewModelCacheLimitHelpText: Number of categories to cache. This applies to product listings through category navigation only and not to search results.
resources.blockSizeRequiredHelpText: Enter the number of products to load per request. The block size setting applies to product listings through category navigation only and not to search results.
resources.listTypeHelpText: Select whether the widget instance is a product listing or search results list type.
resources.shouldUseStyleBasedHelpText: Check to use style based listing.
resources.productListingFieldsRequiredHelpText: Enter a list of fields to be included in the response, separated by commas. The fields setting applies to product listings through category navigation only and not to search results.
resources.shouldUseViewModelCachingTextLabel: Use client side view model caching.
resources.viewModelCacheLimitTextLabel: Enter the number of categories to cache at any specific time.
